faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about HalalCheck AI

restaurants.question: Do you check restaurants?
restaurants.answer: No, we specialize exclusively in product verification. We analyze ingredients in packaged foods, beverages, and consumer products - not restaurant meals or prepared foods.

accuracy.question: How accurate is the AI?
accuracy.answer: Our AI achieves 99% accuracy by cross-referencing multiple halal certification databases and continuously learning from expert reviews and user feedback.

availability.question: When will it be available?
availability.answer: We're launching in July 2025. Early access users will get the app 30 days before the public release, plus exclusive benefits.

cost.question: Is there a cost?
cost.answer: Basic scanning is free forever. Premium features like detailed reports and bulk scanning require a subscription, but early users get 50% off for life.
